IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE HOUSING FOR PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO CREATE AND SUSTAIN HOUSING AND OTHER COMMUNITY RESOURCES THAT PROVIDE AFFORDABILITY, ACCESSIBILITY AND INDEPENDENCE TO THOSE IN NEED.
IRS990.Desc: THE CORPORATION FOR INDEPENDENT LIVING ("CIL") SERVES AS THE PARENT ORGANIZATION FOR CIL REALTY, INC., CIL COMMUNITY RESOURCES, INC., AND CIL HOUSING, INC. CIL PROVIDES SIGNIFICANT SUPPORT SERVICES TO OTHER NON PROFIT PROVIDER AGENCIES AND LOW INCOME INDIVIDUALS WITH DISABILITIES THROUGH THE TURNKEY DEVELOPMENT OF COMMUNITY BASED GROUP HOMES AND NON RESIDENTIAL OFFICE AND PROGRAM SPACE, CONSULTING ON THE INDEPENDENT DEVELOPMENT OF GROUP HOMES FOR OTHER AGENCIES, PROPERTY MANAGEMENT, CONSTRUCTION AND SALE OF SINGLE FAMILY AFFORDABLE HOMES AND ADMINISTERING THE ONLY LOW-INTEREST LOAN AND GRANT PROGRAM IN THE STATE DESIGNED TO PAY FOR ACCESSIBILITY RENOVATIONS TO HOMES OF LOW TO MODERATE INCOME FAMILIES WITH DISABILITIES.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART III, LINE 12, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: MISCELLANEOUS - 2014 AMOUNT: $ 162,654. 2015 AMOUNT: $ 6,350. 2016 AMOUNT: $ 7,111. 2017 AMOUNT: $ 52,950. FUNDRAISING - 2014 AMOUNT: $ 35,290. 2015 AMOUNT: $ 29,903. 2016 AMOUNT: $ 26,680. 2017 AMOUNT: $ 18,380. HISTORIC TAX CREDITS - 2016 AMOUNT: $ 5,000,000.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION PAID UPDIKE, KELLY & SPELLACY TO PROVIDE LOBBYING SERVICES FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018.

MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT CIL'S, REALTY'S, HOUSING'S AND COMMUNITY RESOURCE'S INCOME TAX RETURNS FOR FISCAL YEARS 2015 AND PRIOR ARE NO LONGER SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES. AS OF JUNE 30, 2018, THE CORPORATION HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. IF CIL HAS UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAXES, CIL WILL RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS PART OF THE INCOME TAX PROVISION AND INCLUDE ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES WITH THE RELATED LIABILITY ON THE STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MONITORS ALL CONTRACTS AND OTHER BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS AS THEY ARE PROCESSED FOR APPROVAL ON A CONTINUOUS BASIS FOR ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST WITH ANY BOARD MEMBERS, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS OR KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT/CEO'S COMPENSATION IS REVIEWED AND DOCUMENTED ANNUALLY BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND COMPENSATION ADJUSTMENTS ARE MADE WITH REFERENCE TO INDEPENDENT COMPARABILITY DATA. THE OTHER OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES' COMPENSATION IS ALSO REVIEWED AND DOCUMENTED ANNUALLY AND COMPARABILITY ADJUSTMENTS ARE MADE IN THE CONTEXT OF AN OVERALL SALARY SCHEDULE THAT IS COMPARED TO COMPARABILITY DATA AT LEAST EVERY OTHER YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THERE HAVE BEEN NO CHANGES MADE TO THE ORGANIZATION'S OVERSIGHT OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR.
